notes.text:
This update for git fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-40330: Fixed unexpected cross-protocol requests via newline character in git_connect_git repository path (bsc#1189992).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: git_connect_git in connect.c in Git before 2.30.1 allows a repository path to contain a newline character, which may result in unexpected cross-protocol requests, as demonstrated by the git://localhost:1234/%0d%0a%0d%0aGET%20/%20HTTP/1.1 substring.
